Today in County Clare, surf is on at 8 ft @ 14s WNW with fresh 17 mph SE winds. Crab Island and Doolin Point are your best bets, especially during their prime tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 13 ft @ 14s WSW with strong 23 mph WSW winds, making it poor across the board. By the day after, we see a nice recovery with 7 ft @ 12s W and light 7 mph SSE winds, offering clean surf at Crab Island and Doolin Point. Best: day after.
